vulnerability_findings.name: use-ownable2step
vulnerability_findings.message: By demanding that the receiver of the owner permissions actively accept via a contract call of its own,  `Ownable2Step` and `Ownable2StepUpgradeable` prevent the contract ownership from accidentally being transferred  to an address that cannot handle it.

vulnerability_findings.message: Consider making costructor payable to save gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function owner() public view returns (address) {

    return _owner;
vulnerability_findings.message: Ownable.owner (CustomPolygonMapping.sol#30-32) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Ownable.renounceOwnership (CustomPolygonMapping.sol#56-59) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.message: Ownable.transferOwnership (CustomPolygonMapping.sol#65-67) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in CustomPolygonMapping.syncState (CustomPolygonMapping.sol#155-166):
	-(success,resultData) = receiver.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(onStateReceive(uint256,bytes),counter,data)) CustomPolygonMapping.sol#161-163

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'Ownable._transferOwnership' (CustomPolygonMapping.sol#73-77) is not in mixedCase

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))
